00017 #define BOUNDSEARCH_PATH "src/Bullet3OpenCL/ParallelPrimitives/kernels/BoundSearchKernels.cl"
00018 #define KERNEL0 "SearchSortDataLowerKernel"
00019 #define KERNEL1 "SearchSortDataUpperKernel"
00020 #define KERNEL2 "SubtractKernel"
00021 
00022 
00023 #include "b3BoundSearchCL.h"
00024 #include "Bullet3OpenCL/Initialize/b3OpenCLUtils.h"
00025 #include "b3LauncherCL.h"
00026 #include "kernels/BoundSearchKernelsCL.h"
00027 
00028 b3BoundSearchCL::b3BoundSearchCL(cl_context ctx, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue, int maxSize)
00029         :m_context(ctx),
00030         m_device(device),
00031         m_queue(queue)
00032 {
00033 
00034         const char* additionalMacros = "";
00035         //const char* srcFileNameForCaching="";
00036 
00037         cl_int pErrNum;
00038         const char* kernelSource = boundSearchKernelsCL;
00039 
00040         cl_program boundSearchProg = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, &pErrNum,additionalMacros, BOUNDSEARCH_PATH);
00041         b3Assert(boundSearchProg);
00042 
00043         m_lowerSortDataKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, "SearchSortDataLowerKernel", &pErrNum, boundSearchProg,additionalMacros );
00044         b3Assert(m_lowerSortDataKernel );
00045 
00046         m_upperSortDataKernel= b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, "SearchSortDataUpperKernel", &pErrNum, boundSearchProg,additionalMacros );
00047         b3Assert(m_upperSortDataKernel);
00048 
00049         m_subtractKernel = 0;
00050 
00051         if( maxSize )
00052         {
00053                 m_subtractKernel= b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( ctx, device, kernelSource, "SubtractKernel", &pErrNum, boundSearchProg,additionalMacros );
00054                 b3Assert(m_subtractKernel);
00055         }
00056 
00057         //m_constBuffer = new b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4>( device, 1, BufferBase::BUFFER_CONST );
00058         
00059         m_lower = (maxSize == 0)? 0: new b3OpenCLArray<unsigned int>(ctx,queue,maxSize );
00060         m_upper = (maxSize == 0)? 0: new b3OpenCLArray<unsigned int>(ctx,queue, maxSize );
00061 
00062         m_filler = new b3FillCL(ctx,device,queue);
00063 }
00064 
00065 b3BoundSearchCL::~b3BoundSearchCL()
00066 {
00067         
00068         delete m_lower;
00069         delete m_upper;
00070         delete m_filler;
00071                         
00072         clReleaseKernel(m_lowerSortDataKernel);
00073         clReleaseKernel(m_upperSortDataKernel);
00074         clReleaseKernel(m_subtractKernel);
00075         
00076 
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 void b3BoundSearchCL::execute(b3OpenCLArray<b3SortData>& src, int nSrc, b3OpenCLArray<unsigned int>& dst, int nDst, Option option )
00081 {
00082         b3Int4 constBuffer;
00083         constBuffer.x = nSrc;
00084         constBuffer.y = nDst;
00085 
00086         if( option == BOUND_LOWER )
00087         {
00088                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { b3BufferInfoCL( src.getBufferCL(), true ), b3BufferInfoCL( dst.getBufferCL()) };
00089 
00090                 b3LauncherCL launcher( m_queue, m_lowerSortDataKernel,"m_lowerSortDataKernel" );
00091                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00092                 launcher.setConst( nSrc );
00093         launcher.setConst( nDst );
00094         
00095                 launcher.launch1D( nSrc, 64 );
00096         }
00097         else if( option == BOUND_UPPER )
00098         {
00099                 b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { b3BufferInfoCL( src.getBufferCL(), true ), b3BufferInfoCL( dst.getBufferCL() ) };
00100 
00101                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_upperSortDataKernel,"m_upperSortDataKernel" );
00102                 launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00103         launcher.setConst( nSrc );
00104         launcher.setConst( nDst );
00105 
00106                 launcher.launch1D( nSrc, 64 );
00107         }
00108         else if( option == COUNT )
00109         {
00110                 b3Assert( m_lower );
00111                 b3Assert( m_upper );
00112                 b3Assert( m_lower->capacity() <= (int)nDst );
00113                 b3Assert( m_upper->capacity() <= (int)nDst );
00114 
00115                 int zero = 0;
00116                 m_filler->execute( *m_lower, zero, nDst );
00117                 m_filler->execute( *m_upper, zero, nDst );
00118 
00119                 execute( src, nSrc, *m_lower, nDst, BOUND_LOWER );
00120                 execute( src, nSrc, *m_upper, nDst, BOUND_UPPER );
00121 
00122                 {
00123                         b3BufferInfoCL bInfo[] = { b3BufferInfoCL( m_upper->getBufferCL(), true ), b3BufferInfoCL( m_lower->getBufferCL(), true ), b3BufferInfoCL( dst.getBufferCL() ) };
00124 
00125                         b3LauncherCL  launcher( m_queue, m_subtractKernel ,"m_subtractKernel");
00126                         launcher.setBuffers( bInfo, sizeof(bInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00127             launcher.setConst( nSrc );
00128             launcher.setConst( nDst );
00129 
00130                         launcher.launch1D( nDst, 64 );
00131                 }
00132         }
00133         else
00134         {
00135                 b3Assert( 0 );
00136         }
00137 
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 void b3BoundSearchCL::executeHost( b3AlignedObjectArray<b3SortData>& src, int nSrc, 
00142         b3AlignedObjectArray<unsigned int>& dst,  int nDst, Option option )
00143 {
00144 
00145 
00146         for(int i=0; i<nSrc-1; i++) 
00147                 b3Assert( src[i].m_key <= src[i+1].m_key );
00148 
00149         b3SortData minData,zeroData,maxData;
00150         minData.m_key = -1;
00151         minData.m_value = -1;
00152         zeroData.m_key=0;
00153         zeroData.m_value=0;
00154         maxData.m_key = nDst;
00155         maxData.m_value = nDst;
00156 
00157         if( option == BOUND_LOWER )
00158         {
00159                 for(int i=0; i<nSrc; i++)
00160                 {
00161                         b3SortData& iData = (i==0)? minData: src[i-1];
00162                         b3SortData& jData = (i==nSrc)? maxData: src[i];
00163 
00164                         if( iData.m_key != jData.m_key )
00165                         {
00166                                 int k = jData.m_key;
00167                                 {
00168                                         dst[k] = i;
00169                                 }
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172         }
00173         else if( option == BOUND_UPPER )
00174         {
00175                 for(int i=1; i<nSrc+1; i++)
00176                 {
00177                         b3SortData& iData = src[i-1];
00178                         b3SortData& jData = (i==nSrc)? maxData: src[i];
00179 
00180                         if( iData.m_key != jData.m_key )
00181                         {
00182                                 int k = iData.m_key;
00183                                 {
00184                                         dst[k] = i;
00185                                 }
00186                         }
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         else if( option == COUNT )
00190         {
00191                 b3AlignedObjectArray<unsigned int> lower;
00192                 lower.resize(nDst );
00193                 b3AlignedObjectArray<unsigned int> upper;
00194                 upper.resize(nDst );
00195 
00196                 for(int i=0; i<nDst; i++) 
00197                 { 
00198                         lower[i] = upper[i] = 0; 
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 executeHost( src, nSrc, lower, nDst, BOUND_LOWER );
00202                 executeHost( src, nSrc, upper, nDst, BOUND_UPPER );
00203 
00204                 for( int i=0; i<nDst; i++) 
00205                 { 
00206                         dst[i] = upper[i] - lower[i]; 
00207                 }
00208         }
00209         else
00210         {
00211                 b3Assert( 0 );
00212         }
00213 }
